briefTitle: Study of CoQ10 During One Cycle of Doxorubicin Treatment for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Phase I Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Cross-Over, Dose-Finding Pharmacokinetic Study of CoQ10 During One Cycle of Doxorubicin Treatment for Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Maximum tolerated dose of CoQ10 that does not alter the pharmacokinetics of doxorubicin
